topics.topic_title: YUMA YALEMA YAKWATA ITUÑA (Things of value for the nation)

sub_topics.title: Kuhanjeka (Discussion)
competences: Kuzatisha mazu amawahi hakuhanjeka hansañu yinakwati hachihandilu chawantu (Yuma yinateli kukwasha antu kuzata nikushakama chiwahi mwiluña dawu)
Use appropriate vocabulary to discuss topics related to human life (Things that help people live well in their country)

instructional_blocks.hook: Ihulaku atudizi alumbululi chiyelañawu munyikala neyi antu anadivulumuni hela anaboboli muntu wumu namukwawu
teacher_steps: Ambulaku atudizi mumazanvu
Alezhi atudizi ahanjiki hayuma yinatweshi kukwasha antu kuzata nikushakama chiwahi mwiluña dawu
learner_steps: Ahanjiki hayuma yinatweshi kukwasha antu kuzata nikushakama chiwahi mwiluña dawu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kuhanjeka hamutu wudi wezhima hayuma yinakwati kuchihandilu chawantu (Yuma yinateli kukwasha antu kuzata nikushakama chiwahi mwiluña dawu) mumazanvu. Yuma yidi neyi; kukeña, kavumbi, kuzatila hamu, kwikala na walala, kuzata nañovu niyuma yikwawu.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kufuma mumazanvu kwinza kumbidi nakulumbulula yuma yinahanjikuwu mumazanvu (kukeña, walala, kavumbi, kuzatila hamu, kuzata nañovu, niyuma yikwawu)
learner_steps: Kwinza kumbidi nakulumbulula yuma yinahanjikuwu mumazanvu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kulumbulula nsañu zhinahanjikewi mumazanvu.

questions: Yuma yahanjikewa mumazanvu yinalumbululewi chaloña

learner_steps: Ahanjiki mwalumbulukila mazu akutaña
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kuhanjeka hamazu akutaña anasakulewi (mumazanvu).

teacher_steps: Alezhi nsoneki wumu wumu kufuma mumazanvu kwinza kumbidi nakushimuna mwalumbulukila mazu anahanjikuwu
learner_steps: Ashimuni mwalumbulukila mazu anahanjikuwu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kushimuna mwalumbulukila mazu akutaña.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi azatishi mazu akutaña asakulewa munyikuku yamazu
learner_steps: Azatishi mazu akutaña asakulewa munyikuku yamazu

Mazu akutaña asakulewa anazatishewi munyikuku yamazu chaloña

sub_topics.title: Kutaña kwakunama - Kutaña nakanañachima (Intensive reading - Reading with comprehension)
competences: Kutaña nsañu yinamboki yahachipimu chawu nakuyitiyishisha
Read various texts according to their standard and comprehend them

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi atañi nsañu yidi mwishina nakuyitiyishisha
learner_steps: Atañi nsañu yidi mwishina nakuyitiyishisha
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Yuma yakutukwasha mushakamini nimunzatilu yetu. Iluña hiluña mwekalaña anlomboli alombolañamu. Wunlomboli weniwu wekala muyedi. Kwekala wunlomboli wawukatu niwunlomboli wakubula wukatu...

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kwakula malwihu adi mwishina
learner_steps: Akuli malwihu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kwakula malwihu amboka.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kwihihishi nsañu yinatañuwu
learner_steps: Ehihishi nsañu yinatañuwu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kwihihisha nsañu yinatañuwu.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kusoneka nsañu yoyimu yinatañewi munzhila yikwawu
learner_steps: Asoneki nsañu yoyimu yinatañuwu munzhila yikwawu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kusoneka nsañu yinatañewi munzhila yikwawu.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kuhanjika mwalumbulukila mazu akutaña
learner_steps: Ahanjiki mwalumbulukila mazu akutaña
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kuhanjeka mwalumbulukila mazu akutaña.

questions: Izwinyi diwunatañi muniyi nsañu dalumbuluka nawu ntwamina?

Sonekaku yuma yiyedi yamwekanaña kudi nlomboli wawukatu
Yumanyi yitanu yiwunatañi yinatweshi kukwasha antu kushakama chachiwahi nakuzatila hamu?

Read various texts fluently according to their standard

learner_steps: Atañili nsañu hewulu nakashinshi, nampinji nakumwekesha kukulukila
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kutañila nsañu hewulu nakashinshi, nampinji nakumwekesha kukulikila.

learner_steps: Akuli malwihu mukuhosha

questions: Nsañu yinatañewi hewulu chachiwahi
Malwihu ehulewa anakulewi mukuhosha chaloña

teacher_steps: Alumbulwili atudizi mwakusonekela katuñi kakutontolola (antu)
Alezhi atudizi ahanjiki mwakusonekela katuñi kakutontolola(antu)
learner_steps: Ahanjeki chekala niyuma yawanikaña mukusoneka katuñi kakutontolola (antu)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Yuma yatela kuwanika mukatuñi kakutontolola: Mutu wansañu, Kulumbulula, Muzhimba wansañu, Kukunkulula. Hakusoneka watela: Kutoñozhoka, Kufukula, Kusoneka, Kuhitulukamu

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kusoneka katuñi kakutontolola chekala mukulumpi washikola yawu
learner_steps: Asoneki katuñi kakutontolola chekala mukulumpi washikola yawu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kusoneka katuñi kakutontolola muntu.

questions: Chekala niyuma yawanikaña mukusoneka katuñi kakutontolola yinahanjikewi mwatelela
Katuñi kakutontozhola chekala mukulumpi washikola yawu kanasonekewi mwatelela

sub_topics.title: Mwaya idimi - Ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu (Language structure - Prefixes, infixes and suffixes)
competences: Kuzatisha ntachikilu ni insa nakutuña mazu
Use prefixes and suffixes to form words

teacher_steps: Sonekaku mazu hachibasa nakulezha atudizi mwalumbulukila nimwazatikilaña ntachikilu,kahakachi ni insa yamazu
learner_steps: Ashimuni mwalumbulukila ni mwazatikilaña ntachikilu ni insa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Chitalilu: Muntu-munidi izu 'mu' diyu ntachikilu 'tu' diyu insa. Chizembi-munidi izu 'chi' diyu ntachikilu 'mbi' diyu insa. Wunakudila-munidi izu 'na' diyu kahakachi.

teacher_steps: Sonekaku mazu hachibasa kulonda atudizi awani ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa
learner_steps: Awani ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu adi hachibasa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kuwana nyichidi yantachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi ambuli ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu kweseka nanyichidi yachu
learner_steps: Ambuli ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu kweseka nanyichidi yachu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kwambula ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu kweseka na nyichidi yachu.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kutuña mazu kuzatisha ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa
learner_steps: Atuñi mazu kuzatisha ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kutuña mazu kuzatisha ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa.

questions: Mwalumbulukila ni mwazatikilaña ntachikilu ni nsa yamazu munalumbululewi chaloña
Nyichidi ya ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu yinawanewi muchatelela
Ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa yamazu yinambulewi chaloña
Mazu anatuñewi choloka kuzatisha ntachikilu, kahakachi ni insa

teacher_steps: Ambulaku atudizi mumazanvu kulonda ahanjiki mwalumbulukila nhoshelu nimwakuyizatishila
learner_steps: Ahanjiki nakushimuna mwalumbulukila nhoshelu ni muyazatikilaña kweseka nachitalilu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Nhoshelu: Kulumbulula, Muyazatikilaña. Mesu neyi katubwa - Mesu indi atooka - Kulumbulula muntu wukweti mesu atooka nankashi. Mutu neyi ikuñu - Mutu windi weneni - Kulumbulula muntu wukweti mutu weneni. Mesu neyi muñanzhi - Mesu indi achinana - Kulumbulula muntu wukweti mesu achinana

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kwambuzhola nhoshelu kweseka namuyazatikilaña
learner_steps: Ambuzholi nhoshelu kweseka namuyazatikilaña
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kwambula nhoshelu kweseka na muyazatikilaña. Welaña dinu wutooki. Iwu muntu himutupa. Mazewu neyi mpumba. Kayombu nadiñizhi mwizhiku.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kuwana nhoshelu yatelela kuzatisha kweseka nansañu yinamwekani
learner_steps: Awani nhoshelu yatelela kuzatisha kweseka nansañu yinamwekani
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kuwana nhoshelu yatela kuzatisha kweseka nansañu yinamwekani.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi kuwana nsañu yinamwekani hatelela kuzatikila nhoshelu
learner_steps: Awani nsañu hatelela kuzatishila nhoshelu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kuwana nsañu yinamwekani hatelela kuzatikila nhoshelu.

questions: Mwalumbulukila nhoshelu ni muyazatikilaña munahanjikewi chatelela
Nhoshelu yinambulewi kweseka na muyazatikilaña
Nhoshelu yatelela kuzatisha hansñu yinamwekani yinawanewi chaloña
Nsañu hatela kuzatishila nhoshelu yinawanewi chaloña

sub_topics.title: Kubalumuna nsañu - Nzhila zhakubalumwinamu nsañu (Translation - Translation methods)
competences: Kuzatisha nzhila zhamboka hakubalumuna nsañu kufuma mu Chizungu nakutwala mu Lunda ni kufuma mu Lunda nakutwala mu Chizungu
Use various methods to translate from English to Lunda and from Lunda to English

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi abalumuni iyi nsañu yidi mu Chizungu nakutwala mu Lunda
learner_steps: Abalumuni nsañu kufuma muChizungu nakutwala mu Lunda
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Governance in Pre-Colonial Zambia: Governance is as old as humanity. All societies on earth had at least one form of governance or another. Societies such as the Ngonis, Bembas, Tumbukas, Lozis and Lundas were ruled by Kings. Rulers had absolute power over people...

questions: Nzhila zhamboka-mboka zhakubalumwinamu nsañu kufuma mumuchidi wumu kuwunakufumina nakutwala mumuchidi wukwawu kunabalumunewi chaloña

topics.topic_title: NSAÑU ZHEMENA HAWALALA NIHAYITOÑOZHOKA (Facts and Opinions)

sub_topics.title: Kuhanjeka - Nsañu zhemena hawalala ni hayitoñozhoka (Discussion - Facts and opinions)
competences: Ambulaku nsañu yemena haWalala kufuma muyitoñozhoka kuhitila mukuhanjeka, Muyihosha hela mukupompa
Distinguish facts from opinions through discussion, speech or debate

teacher_steps: Ashi atudizi mumazanvu
Atudizi asakuli nsoneki ni muketanda wezanvu
Alezhi atudizi ambuli nsañu yemena hawalala ni hayitoñozhoka (Mumukanda waNzambi mwawanikaña hohu yuma yakuzañalesha, Mukanda wa Nzambi diwu ikuñulwilu danyikanda yezhima)
learner_steps: Ambuli nsañu zhinemeni hawalala ni hayitoñozhoka
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kwambula nsañu zhinemeni hawalala ni hayitoñozhoka. Chitalilu: 1.Mumukanda waNzambi mwawanikaña hohu yuma yakuzañalesha 2.Mukanda waNzambi diwu chikuñulwilu chanyikanda yezhima.

teacher_steps: Alezhi atudizi ashimuni nsañu zhemena hawalala ni hayitoñozhoka
learner_steps: Ashimuni nsañu zhemena hawalala nihayitoñozhoka
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Kushimuna nsañu zhemena hawalala ni hayitoñozhoka.

questions: Nsañu zhemena hawalala zhinambulewi kufuma kunsañu zhemena hayitoñozhoka chatelela
Nsañu zhemena hawalala nihayitoñozhoka zhinashimunewi chaloña
